title: OS Level 3 â€” CPU Scheduling Algorithms
intro: This level covers the need for CPU scheduling and basic scheduling algorithms.
points: Understand why CPU scheduling is needed in multi-programmed systems.
Know scheduling criteria: CPU utilization, throughput, turnaround time, waiting time, response time.
Study simple algorithms: FCFS (First Come First Serve), SJF (Shortest Job First).
Know basics of SRTF (Shortest Remaining Time First) and Priority scheduling (concept).
Understand the difference between preemptive and non-preemptive scheduling.
